attributes.action: self-employed people to be given the option of a loan like the big companies
attributes.additional_details:
Big companies are are now allowed to take out a loan to keep the company and the salaries of the people in the company's afloat. The self employed people that actually work on a building site should be given the same option.

The government seem to be keeping the big guys going and forgetting about the little man that is actually getting there hands dirty to do the job.
attributes.background: Big companies are are now allowed to take out a loan to keep the company and the salaries of the people in the company's afloat. The self employed people that actually work on a building site should be given the same option

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government has announced help for self-employed people, including grants. 

If you'd like something else, you could start a new petition explaining what that is

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:
 
NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
 
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
